fulltext:
Ho Hoang Duc  
¨ Add:  
Building No 06, Lane 2, Tran Thai 
Tong, Cau Giay, Hanoi 
¨ Country: 
Vietnam 
¨ Mobile: 
+84 906 227 386 
¨ Email: 
Duc.hohoang@gmail.com 
¨ Date of Birth: 
29/09/1988 
¨ Nationality: 
Vietnamese 
Personal Information 
¨ More than 2 years of experience in working with data related to E-commerce and 
retail, including data pipeline maintenance, data cleaning, analyzing and reporting. 
¨ 4 years of experience in providing consultancy service for local and international 
partners 
¨ Experience in qualitative and quantitative research 
¨ Holding research interest in social development and governance 
¨ Experience in working with vulnerable groups such as ethnic minority communities, 
women, children and the poor 
¨ Capable of academic and report writing 
Summary 
¨ 2006 – 2010  
Diplomatic Academy of Vietnam  
Bachelor in International Economics 
¨ 2013 – 2014  
University of Sussex 
Master in Social Development 
Education 
¨ 2019  
Training course on Google cloud storage and Bigquery 
¨ 2011   
Training course on Fair Trade of Helvetas & HRPC/VIRI 
¨ 2011  
Stata training course of VietSurvey 
Other Training 
¨ Vietnamese:  
Native language 
¨ English: 
Advanced  
Languages  
¨ Spreadsheet:  
MS Excel/Power Pivot/Power Query 
Computer Skills 
¨ Word processing: 
MS Word 
¨ Graphics: 
MS PowerPoint 
¨ Statistics: 
Stata, Power BI, Tableau 
¨ Query:  
MySQL, Oracle, Postgres, Bigquery 
¨ Data warehousing: 
Bigquery 
¨ GO-VIET Technology Trading Co., LTD 
• 
Position: Business Intelligence Senior Manager (from Mar 2018 
to present) 
• 
Main duty: 
o Data pipeline maintenance via Airflow, GCS 
o Working with large scale data from Bigquery to provide in-
depth analysis and modeling 
o Constructing automatic reporting system using Tableau, 
Metabase 
¨ Vincommerce General Commercial Services Joint Stock Company - Vingroup 
• 
Position: Senior Business Analyst (from Oct 2016 to Mar 2018) 
• 
Main duty: 
o In charge of providing in-depth analysis related to sales 
performance, operations, marketing and customer 
behavior 
o Building efficient reporting system using Power BI 
o Dealing with ad-hoc request/analysis using Oracle 
¨ VietSurvey Research and Analysis (VietSurvey) 
• 
Position: Researcher (from Aug 2011 to Sept 2015 
• 
Main duty: In charge of designing and implementing research 
(both qualitative and quantitative) related to development sector 
¨ Oxfam Hong Kong (OHK) 
• 
Position: Internship (from Mar 2011 to Aug 2011) 
• 
Main duty: In charge of logistics preparation, auditing and 
accounting, interpreting & document translation 
Employment Record 
¨ 2016 – 2017 – Research on players of E-commerce market in Vietnam 
• 
Activities performed: Analyze secondary data, collecting data from key 
stakeholders to identify advantages and strategy of each player. 
¨ 2016 – 2017 – Research on behavior of E-commerce customers 
• 
Activities performed: Cleaning data, analyze data and provide the 
demographic of customers, propose marketing and business strategy 
for each specific group of customers. 
¨ 2015 – Implement research on motorcycle sales in Vietnam 
• 
Position: Researcher, team leader 
• 
Client: Institute of Developing Economies 
Highlight Research Projects 
• 
Location: Hanoi, Da Nang, Quang Nam and HCMC 
• 
Activities performed: design sampling frame, collect raw data in the 
field, process and analyze data, write field and draft report  
¨ 2015 – Implement Mid-term evaluation for “Improvement of computer usage and public 
internet access ability in Vietnam” of Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation (BMGF) 
• 
Position: Researcher, Team leader 
• 
Client: BMGF, Ministry of Information and Communication 
• 
Location: 28 selected provinces  
• 
Activities performed: re-design questionnaires for the evaluation, 
conduct data collection in 3 provinces (Thanh Hoa, Nghe An, Ha Tinh), 
clean and analyze collected data, write report. 
¨ 2014 – Implement Mid-term Review for REDD+ training and capacity building program 
of RECOFTC 
• 
Position: Researcher 
• 
Client: RECOFTC 
• 
Location: Hanoi, Ha Tinh, Lam Dong 
• 
Activities performed: in-depth review project document related to 
Reducing Emission from Deforestation and Forest Degradation 
(REDD+), Free Prior and Informed Consent, Climate Change, UN 
REDD program; conduct in-depth interview and focus group discussion 
with stakeholders from different levels; analyze data and write report  
¨ 2013 – Develop manual for working with ethnic minority communities 
• 
Position: Researcher 
• 
Client: International Labour Organization (ILO) 
• 
Location: Quang Nam 
• 
Activities performed: review existed document related to ethnic 
minority in Vietnam; conduct in-depth interview and focus group 
discussion with different target groups including local officials, NGOs’ 
staff and ethnic households; develop the manual 
¨ 2012 – Provide training on sub-sector analysis, selection and planning  
• 
Position: Researcher, trainer, facilitator 
• 
Client: Oxfam International 
• 
Location: Da Krong district (Quang Tri) 
• 
Activities performed: review existed training toolkit and document of 
Oxfam on agricultural sub-sector and value chain; design training 
curricular, deliver training to local officials on data collection and 
analysis skills 
¨ 2011 – Design the M&E system and collect data for ILO inland pro-poor and pro-job 
Tourism project  
• 
Position: Researcher, moderator 
• 
Client: International Labour Organization 
• 
Location: Quang Nam 
• 
Activities performed: Literature review; set up monitoring assessment 
indicators; conduct baseline survey; design log-frame & result chain, 
analysis framework, write report 
¨ 2011 – Conduct case study on impacts of agri-SOEs’ equitization on local 
communities and land use right. 
• 
Position: Researcher 
• 
Client: Oxfam Hong Kong & Government Office 
• 
Location: Thanh Hoa, Nghe An 
• 
Activities performed: Literature review, design qualitative survey, 
conduct in-depth interview and group discussion, write report 
¨ 2011 – In-depth analysis of the interventions programs for Oxfam HK’s project - a 
value chain approach for the poor 
• 
Position: Researcher, moderator 
• 
Client: Oxfam Hong Kong 
• 
Location: Quang Tri 
• 
Activities performed: Literature review, design qualitative & quantitative 
study; conduct qualitative survey using focus group discussion and in-
depth interview; write report 
¨ 2011 – Study on maize and bamboo value chain 
• 
Position: Researcher, moderator 
• 
Client: Oxfam Hong Kong (based in Laos) 
• 
Location: Yen Bai 
• 
Activities performed: Literature review; collect data by in-depth 
interview and focus group discussion; analyze data and write report 
¨ 2011 – Assess the impact of flash flood on local communities  
• 
Position: Researcher 
• 
Client: Oxfam Hong Kong 
• 
Location: Nghe An 
• 
Activities performed: design and implement survey to assess impact of 
flash flood, assist local officials in supplying ethnic households with 
packages 
¨ Mr. Nguyen Quach Nhi – Former Managing Director of FMCG center at Adayroi – 
Vincommerce – Vingroup 
• 
Add: 
T26 Building, 458 Minh Khai, Hanoi, Vietnam 
• 
Tel: 
+84 939 242 323 
• 
Email:  v.nhinq@adayroi.com 
¨ Mr. Phung Tuan Duc – Former Managing Director of Grocery Division at Adayroi – 
Vincommerce - Vingroup 
• 
Add: 
T26 Building, 458 Minh Khai, Hanoi, Vietnam 
• 
Tel: 
+84 973 728 998 
• 
Email:  v.ducpt@adayroi.com 
¨ Dr. Grace Carswell – Senior Lecturer in Human Geography (Geography, Sussex 
Centre for Migration Research, International Development) 
• 
Add: 
C203, Arts building, University of Sussex, Brighton, UK 
• 
Tel: 
+44 1273 873399/+44 1273 877238 
• 
Email: G.Carswell@sussex.ac.uk 
¨ Mr. Nguyen Duc Nhat – Chairman/Chief Economic of Vietsurvey Research and Analysis 
• 
Add: 
60/100 Doi Can, Ba Dinh, Hanoi, Vietnam 
• 
Tel: 
+84 (04) 3722 8276 
• 
Email: nhat.nguyenduc@vietsurvey.vn 
¨ Mr. Quach Minh Cuong – Director of Vietsurvey Research and Analysis 
• 
Add: 
60/100 Doi Can, Ba Dinh, Hanoi, Vietnam 
References 
• 
Tel: 
+84 (04) 3722 8276 
• 
Email: cuong.quachminh@vietsurvey.vn 
¨ Mr. Pham Quang Trung –  Former Senior Project Officer of Oxfam Hong Kong, Pro-poor
market Programme 
• 
Add: 
No.27-29, Lane 26, Nguyen Hong Str., Dong Da Dist., Hanoi,
Vietnam 
• 
Tel: 
+84 989 086 068 
• 
Email: p.quangtrung@yahoo.com 
I, the undersigned, certify that to the best of my knowledge and belief, this CV correctly 
describes myself, my qualifications, and my experience.  I understand that any willful 
misstatement described herein may lead to my disqualification or dismissal, if engaged. 
Certification 
Date: Apr. 2019 
Ho Hoang Duc
